var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ; var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content')); var book = { name: og('novel:book_name'), author: og('novel:author'), kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''), latest: og('novel:lastest_chapter_name'), intro: og('description').replace(/(^|[。！？]+[”」）】]?)/g, '
